name: Beep Boopacolypse
description:
The city has been conquered by robots- you and a few others sit at its center, its last bastion of human civilization.

Tend to your people

They are a strong bunch, but none can survive without food and shelter. You will also need to watch their morale, and with enough unrest your people will abandon you. On top of all this, it's your responsibility to protect your people from constant robot attacks.

Reclaim the city

Vicious automatons plague the land in every direction, but you cannot let them have it. Send your people out to get food and recruit human stragglers. If you have the skill you may even vanquish them and claim a building for your own.

All this has been left to you, General, godspeed and may your wits be sufficient.
Credits

The city sprites came from Kenney.nl:

https://kenney.nl/assets/isometric-roads-water

https://kenney.nl/assets/isometric-buildings

The delightful music came from Ketsa:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ketsa/Different_Angles/Intermittent
